title: Poppy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Plant a seed of remembrance into a player who had votes when the day ended, allowing you to see into their voters.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Of your target's voters, you will learn how many factions voted them. (If two Town and one Underworld vote, you will get "2 Town, 1 Underworld")
- You cannot target a player with 1 or less votes to their name.

desc:
Post 1686
*This graveyard...is far, far too big...*
